item.title: Tworzenie zasobów za pomocą Azure Portal, Azure CLI, Azure PowerShell, Azure Rest API
item.description: Zadanie domowe z tygodnia 2 (Microsoft Azure – Software Development) 1. Utworzenie Resource group Utworzenie Resource group za pomocą: Azure Portal Azure CLI PowerShell Azure Rest API 1.1 Azure Portal 1.2 Azure CLI RG_NAME="rg-azdev-zad2-cli" RG_LOCATION="westeurope" az group create -n $RG_NAME -l $RG_LOCATION bartosz@Azure:~$ az account list-locations -o table DisplayName Latitude Longitude Name -------------------- ---------- ----------- ------------------ East Asia 22.267 114.188 eastasia Southeast Asia 1.283 103.833 southeastasia Central US 41.
